misuses.misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
misuses.description: The use of the DES algorithm is considered broken and should not be used for encryption. It has been shown to be vulnerable to attacks and it is recommended to use a more secure algorithm such as AES.
misuses.recommendation: Use a more secure encryption algorithm such as AES instead of DES.

misuses.description: The key size of the DES algorithm is too small, which makes it vulnerable to attacks. It is recommended to use a more secure encryption algorithm such as AES with a larger key size.
misuses.recommendation: Use a more secure encryption algorithm such as AES with a larger key size.
